WITH W_VCT_APRV_TB AS ( SELECT A.* , NVL(B.CNT, 0) AS APRV_YN_3_CNT FROM STD_APRV_MNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT APRV_NO , COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM STD_APRV_LINE WHERE APRV_YN_CD = '3' GROUP BY APRV_NO ) B ON (A.APRV_NO = B.APRV_NO)
), W_VCT_DAY_CNT AS ( SELECT A.* FROM VCT_INF_MNG A INNER JOIN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM W_VCT_APRV_TB WHERE (CANCEL_YN IS NULL OR CANCEL_YN != 'Y') AND APRV_YN_3_CNT = 0) B ON (A.APRV_NO = B.APRV_NO) WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ), W_VCT_INF_TB AS (
SELECT #{stdd_yr} AS STDD_YR , A.USS_ID , A.USS_NM , B.CD , B.CD_NM AS VCT_TYPE_NM , B.CD_ORD , C.VCT_GRNT_DAY , NVL(D.VCT_USE_DAY, 0) AS VCT_TOT_USE_CNT , C.VCT_GRNT_DAY - NVL(D.VCT_USE_DAY, 0) AS VCT_LEFT_DAY , NVL(ROUND((NVL(D.VCT_USE_DAY, 0) / DECODE(C.VCT_GRNT_DAY, 0, NULL, C.VCT_GRNT_DAY) * 100) , 2), 0) AS VCT_USE_RATE , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '01') AS JAN_CNT /*1월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '02') AS FEB_CNT /*2월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '03') AS MAR_CNT /*3월 사용일수 */
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND S.VCT_QRTR = 1) AS FIR_QRTR_CNT /*1분기 사용일수*/
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '04') AS APR_CNT/*4월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '05') AS MAY_CNT/*5월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '06') AS JUN_CNT/*6월 사용일수 */
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND S.VCT_QRTR = 2) AS SEC_QRTR_CNT /*2분기 사용일수*/
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '07') AS JUL_CNT/*7월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '08') AS AUg_CNT/*8월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '09') AS SEP_CNT/*9월 사용일수 */
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND S.VCT_QRTR = 3) AS THR_QRTR_CNT /*3분기 사용일수*/
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '10')AS OCT_CNT/*10월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '11') AS NOV_CNT/*11월 사용일수 */ , (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND SUBSTR(S.VCT_DT, 6, 2) = '12') AS DEC_CNT/*12월 사용일수 */
, (SELECT NVL(SUM(S.VCT_DAY_CNT), 0) FROM W_VCT_DAY_CNT S WHERE S.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND S.USS_ID = A.USS_ID AND S.VCT_TYPE = B.CD AND S.VCT_QRTR = 4) AS FRT_QRTR_CNT /*4분기 사용일수*/ FROM ( SELECT * FROM STD_USS_MNG WHERE USS_ID = #{uss_id} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM STD_CD_MNG WHERE UP_CD = 'CD0001011') B ON (1=1) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM VCT_DAY_MNG WHERE USS_ID = #{uss_id} AND STDD_YR = #{stdd_yr}) C ON (A.USS_ID = C.USS_ID AND B.CD = 'CD0001011001') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.USS_ID AS USS_ID , T1.VCT_TYPE AS VCT_TYPE , SUM(T1.VCT_DAY_CNT) AS VCT_USE_DAY FROM (SELECT * FROM VCT_INF_MNG WHERE USS_ID = #{uss_id} AND VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND USE_YN = 'Y') T1 INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM W_VCT_APRV_TB WHERE REPT_APRV_NO = #{uss_id} AND (CANCEL_YN IS NULL OR CANCEL_YN != 'Y') AND APRV_YN_3_CNT = 0) T2 ON (T1.APRV_NO = T2.APRV_NO) GROUP BY T1.USS_ID, T1.VCT_TYPE ) D ON (A.USS_ID = D.USS_ID AND D.VCT_TYPE = B.CD ) ORDER BY B.CD_ORD
) SELECT * FROM W_VCT_INF_TB UNION ALL (SELECT STDD_YR , USS_ID , USS_NM , 'TOTAL' , '소계' , 999 , NULL , SUM(VCT_TOT_USE_CNT) , NULL , NULL , SUM(JAN_CNT) , SUM(FEB_CNT) , SUM(MAR_CNT) , SUM(FIR_QRTR_CNT) , SUM(APR_CNT) , SUM(MAY_CNT) , SUM(JUN_CNT) , SUM(SEC_QRTR_CNT) , SUM(JUL_CNT) , SUM(AUG_CNT) , SUM(SEP_CNT) , SUM(THR_QRTR_CNT) , SUM(OCT_CNT) , SUM(NOV_CNT) , SUM(DEC_CNT) , SUM(FRT_QRTR_CNT) FROM W_VCT_INF_TB GROUP BY STDD_YR, USS_ID, USS_NM)

SELECT A.USS_ID /*사원ID*/ , A.USS_NM /*사원명*/ , B.VCT_GRNT_DAY /*휴가부여일수*/ , NVL(C.VCT_DAY_CNT, 0) AS VCT_DAY_CNT /*연차사용일수*/ , NVL(B.VCT_GRNT_DAY, 0) - NVL(C.VCT_DAY_CNT, 0) AS VCT_LEFT_DAY /*잔여연차일수*/
FROM (SELECT * FROM STD_USS_MNG WHERE USS_ID = #{uss_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM VCT_DAY_MNG WHERE STDD_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND USS_ID = #{uss_id}) B ON (A.USS_ID = B.USS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT G.VCT_YR , G.USS_ID , SUM(G.VCT_DAY_CNT) AS VCT_DAY_CNT FROM VCT_INF_MNG G INNER JOIN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM STD_APRV_MNG WHERE CANCEL_YN IS NULL OR CANCEL_YN != 'Y') I ON (G.APRV_NO = I.APRV_NO) WHERE G.VCT_YR = #{stdd_yr} AND G.USS_ID = #{uss_id} AND G.VCT_TYPE = 'CD0001011001' AND G.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY G.VCT_YR, G.USS_ID) C ON (C.USS_ID = A.USS_ID)
